description: a free AI Therapist to talk to about your problems and feelings, so you can live your life to its fullest.
title: Free AI Therapist
introduction: Free AI Therapist is a non-medical service providing AI-based therapy support.
features: Chats are not saved on servers

faqs.question: Is this service suitable for crisis situations?
faqs.answer: No, you should call 911 or go to the nearest emergency room in a crisis situation.

faqs.question: Are my chats saved on your servers?
faqs.answer: No, your chats are stored locally in your browser.

faqs.question: Can I clear my chat history?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can clear your chat history in the settings by clicking on the icon in the top right.

faqs.question: Is this a medical service?
faqs.answer: No, Free AI Therapist is not a medical service and should not be used for medical advice.
